thread.title: German retail sales show surprise drop in January

title: German retail sales show surprise drop in January
text:
German retail sales show surprise drop in January 2:02pm GMT - 01:45 
An unexpected drop in German retail sales adds to hints of a cooling in Europe's largest economy. As David Pollard reports, a new Reuters poll points to a gathering belief that euro zone economic momentum has peaked.   
An unexpected drop in German retail sales adds to hints of a cooling in Europe's largest economy. As David Pollard reports, a new Reuters poll points to a gathering belief that euro zone economic momentum has peaked.  //reut.rs/2oIMOBS
